title: Emerging investigator series: mitigation of harmful algal blooms by electrochemical ozonation: from bench-scale studies to field applications
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00490F, Paper
Shasha Yang, Luz Estefanny Quispe Cardenas, Athkia Fariha, Nada Shetewi, Victor Melgarejo Cazares, Nanyang Yang, Lewis McCaffrey, Nicole Wright, Michael R. Twiss, Siwen Wang, Stefan J. Grimberg, Yang Yang
Harmful algal blooms threaten ecosystems and water safety, necessitating rapid treatment strategies. This study developed an electrochemical ozonation process to realize simultaneous cyanobacteria inactivation and microcystin removal.
